body_html:
@dartdog Sorry about that, I missed the fact that you called an optimizer directly. Great to hear that you got it to work.

I think you are stuck with what the canned models are defining in terms of metrics, but perhaps you can use the SessionRunHooks to log your own metrics that way?

body:
@dartdog Sorry about that, I missed the fact that you called an optimizer directly. Great to hear that you got it to work.

I think you are stuck with what the canned models are defining in terms of metrics, but perhaps you can use the SessionRunHooks to log your own metrics that way?
